title: How to Bake Vegan Chocolate Crackle Cookies

steps.headline: Prepare the egg replacer as per the package instructions.
steps.description: Add the egg replacer to the dry mixture.

steps.headline: Melt the chocolate in a double boiler.
steps.description: Fold in the melted chocolate. Once mixed in, pour in the vanilla and mix through. Toss in the chocolate chips. Mix through.

steps.headline: Use a teaspoon to drop the cookie dough onto a lined cookie sheet.
Place in the oven.
steps.description: Bake for 10-12 minutes until well done. Remove from the oven. Leave the cookies to cool on a wire cooling rack. Serve once cooled or store in an airtight container.

text: Mix together the dry ingredients.  Prepare the egg replacer as per the package instructions. Add the egg replacer to the dry mixture. Melt the chocolate in a double boiler. Fold in the melted chocolate. Once mixed in, pour in the vanilla and mix through. Toss in the chocolate chips. Mix through. Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Use a teaspoon to drop the cookie dough onto a lined cookie sheet.  Place in the oven. Bake for 10-12 minutes until well done. Remove from the oven. Leave the cookies to cool on a wire cooling rack. Serve once cooled or store in an airtight container. Finished.
